actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to provide that no interest or penalties shall be assessed or collected with respect to tax attributable to a home which was in a local radio contest and which was specially designed for a handicapped foster child of the taxpayer.

summary.text: Provides that no interest, additions to tax, or penalties shall be assessed or collected with respect to tax attributable to a home which was won in a local radio contest and which was specially designed to accommodate a handicapped foster child of the taxpayer, if the income tax is paid within a specified period of time.

titles.title: A bill to provide that no interest or penalties shall be assessed or collected with respect to tax attributable to a home which was in a local radio contest and which was specially designed for a handicapped foster child of the taxpayer.
